document.full_text: mahesh bhupathi and leander paes of india got off to a slow start on a gray and windy afternoon, then kicked the accelerator, coasting away from tommy haas and philipp petzschner of germany, 2-6, 6-3, 6-2.
document.title: bhupathi and paes advance in doubles
lines_and_colors: mahesh bhupathi and leander paes of india got off to a slow start on a gray and windy afternoon, then kicked the accelerator, coasting away from tommy haas and philipp petzschner of germany, 2-6, 6-3, 6-2.
